attributes.title: 🥰terrible🥰
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because someone said if you do timothee chalamet would come to your house so I downloaded it and waited for like 3 weeks and he didn’t come so this app is trash🤮🤮

attributes.title: This app is just bad
attributes.review: Whenever I open the app, it crashes. When it doesn’t crash, it drains my phone’s battery. This is garbage! I just wanted to see our amazing president’s plans!

attributes.title: This app is a joke.               😘❤️🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.review: This app took forever to download then once it did it told me to vote for trump I was upset about this because it I love fairy’s not trump 😘🧚‍♀️❌🍊I am disappointed and devastated by this I think we need to start a fairy nation WHO IS WITH ME!!!!

attributes.title: This app=no❤️😔
attributes.review: If you want to become an orange piece of poo than please ✨download✨ when u download it’s as if your looking through an orange glasses lens and every person you look at morphs into a weird orange potato with a plop of yellow tangled spaghetti on their head😱😱 ❤️❤️

attributes.title: You can’t do this
attributes.review: Trump might ban tic tok so I am going to roast him on the spot when I got on the app I saw a ugly umpa lumpa orange freak who only cares about himself I see a shrimp who doesn’t have the balls to step out of the White House he is the mother of goofy #save tic tok

attributes.title: Insane
attributes.review: I cannot, I downloaded this app to keep up w/ trumps elections & his future plans. Yet when I opened the app it took me to Twitter. I was placed in a group chat w/pedophiles and rapist. Trump later messaged in the group chat some racist tweets. How disappointing....
This app took forever to download and open. I won’t recommend it to anyone because of its slow quality and marketing

attributes.title: Crashing
attributes.review: It constantly made my phone crash and also it was full of fake news and propaganda

attributes.title: This app made me lose my toes!!🥺
attributes.review: So I was getting this app and as soon as I opened it I was so horrified and dropped my phone. It landed on my toes and they started to die. I eventually had to get them amputated so overall, don’t love this app. ✨🦵🏻🔜🦿✨

attributes.title: Scam!
attributes.review: This app made me feel very uncomfortable! I started getting weird harassing messages and notifications, my phone got hacked! I think the Chinese government infiltrated the app and got my personal data!
